name: ipshark-platform
description: Frontend and API for IP Shark platform
author: Dan Greaves <dan@dangreaves.com>

scripts.docker: cd laradock && docker-compose up -d nginx mysql redis php-fpm workspace beanstalkd php-worker
scripts.docker:install: npm run docker:setup && npm run docker && cd laradock && sh install.sh
scripts.docker:ssh: cd laradock && docker-compose exec workspace bash
scripts.docker:rebuild: cd laradock && docker-compose build --no-cache nginx mysql redis php-fpm workspace beanstalkd php-worker
